oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Preston Taylor Homes, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the Preston Taylor Homes (Project Tenn. 5-8), not dated. Built in the mid-1950s as housing for African Americans, the Preston Taylor Homes are located in West Nashville and contain 550 units. Photographed by Jerry Hiland of the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
